ceo_buyer.justification: Infinity Executive Chairman Mr Adrian Byass said “Following a due diligence period we are very pleased to have acquired these en(cid:415)cing explora(cid:415)on assets...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Infinity Lithium Corpora(cid:415)on Limited (‘Infinity’, or ‘the Company’) is pleased to announce the acquisi(cid:415)on of a 100% interest in Highland Resources Limited (Highland)...

currency.justification: The payment is described with a '$' symbol ('$50,000 cash') and the buyer, Infinity Lithium Corporation Limited, is identified with an ASX ticker (ASX.INF), implying the currency is AUD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: Initial Payment (for 100%) - $50,000 cash and 10,000,000 ordinary shares in Infinity Lithium Corporation Limited (ASX.INF).

share_payments_raw.justification: The text provides the number of shares to be issued, but not a price per share or a total monetary value for the share component of the payment.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment is broken down into separate cash and share components, so this combined field is not applicable per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The total potential shares issued is the sum of the initial payment and the performance rights: '10,000,000 ordinary shares in Infinity' and 'Additional deferred consideration Performance Rights (Tranche A and B) for up to 30,000,000 shares' (20,000,000 for Tranche A and 10,000,000 for Tranche B).

issued_share_price.justification: The document does not state the issue price of the shares.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The total commitment is the sum of two tranches. Tranche A requires 'at least 3,000 metres of drilling'. Tranche B requires 'an additional 5,000 metres of drilling... in addition to the 3,000 metres of drilling announced to ASX pursuant Tranche A'.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The exploration commitment is defined in meters of drilling, not a monetary value.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Vesting conditions for performance rights include completing at least 3,000 metres of drilling for Tranche A, and an additional 5,000 metres for Tranche B.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Tranche A [vesting condition is] The Company announcing to ASX that it has completed at least 3,000 metres of drilling... Tranche B [vesting condition is]... it has completed an additional 5,000 metres of drilling... For the avoidance of doubt, this 5,000 metres of drilling is in addition to the 3,000 metres of drilling announced to ASX pursuant Tranche A.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The document does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or equivalent royalty being acquired.

coverage_area_raw.justification: Found in the JORC Table 1, Section 2, under 'Mineral tenement and land tenure status' commentary: 'The ELs cover a total area of 1,509 km2'

coverage_area_unit.justification: Found in the JORC Table 1, Section 2, under 'Mineral tenement and land tenure status' commentary: 'The ELs cover a total area of 1,509 km2'

resource_size_desc.value: the definition of a JORC Code compliant Mineral Resource Estimate (of any category) on a Tenement within the Project in excess of 50,000oz gold at a minimum grade of 1.5 g/t gold
resource_size_desc.justification: This is a vesting condition for Tranche B performance rights: 'the definition of a JORC Code compliant Mineral Resource Estimate (of any category) on a Tenement within the Project in excess of 50,000oz gold at a minimum grade of 1.5 g/t gold'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text provides the buyer's ticker and exchange in the format 'EXCHANGE.TICKER' within parentheses: '...10,000,000 ordinary shares in Infinity Lithium Corporation Limited (ASX.INF)'.
